section.p: The priestess holds up her hand before you can speak. ‘Peace! Whatever your business, all must her adapt to a slower pace of life. Ah, this accursed heat.’ She indicates her brow, and a slave boy runs forward to lick away the film of sweat.
You are faintly repelled by such decadence, but you try to hide it. ‘I have come...’ you begin.
The priestess frowns. ‘Have I not said that things are done differently here in Smogmaw? Approach, sit; tell me your business over a game of cards.’
